abstract: Several defense lawyers and federal prosecutors appear before judge to discuss whether timetable proposed by prosecutors to pick jury for FIFA corruption trial is too aggressive.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have proposed an aggressive timetable, but the judge and some defense lawyers expressed concerns about the amount of information still being gathered in the case.

headline.main: Lawyers in FIFA Corruption Case Argue Over Possible Trial Date
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Argue Over Trial Date in FIFA Case

snippet: Prosecutors have proposed an aggressive timetable, but the judge and some defense lawyers expressed concerns about the amount of information still being gathered in the case.
